greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, modified Thue-Morse sequence (A010060 with offset 1): change 0 to 2, else 1.
formula: Given A010060 starting with offset 1, change zeros to 2, retain 1's. By rows, (n+1)-th row = n-th row with n-th row appended under morphism 1->2, 2->1.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Given A010060 starting with 1 (below, top row); 0->2, else 1:
Triangle read by rows, row 4 = (1, 2, 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 2) = (2, 1, 1, 2) appended to the right of (1, 2, 2, 1).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jun 05 2009
